description:
Use Case Description
---------------------
LANG-1216 addresses a bug fix between version 3.3.1 and 3.3.2 RC1.
'testEscapeJavaWithSlash' is found in both test suites. The failing line has been added to show this behavior. 
Issue: NumberUtils.isNumber not detecting a floating point(0.1) as a valid number.
This test case passes in V3.3.2RC1 but fails in V3.3.1
